PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign the CONVENTION ON THE PROHIBITION OF THE USE, STOCKPILING, PRODUCTION AND TRANSFER OF ANTI-PERSONNEL MINES AND ON THEIR DESTRUCTION or, (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing Donald W. Campbell, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, to sign the Convention for Canada.
